thread.section_title: Excelsior Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great weekend
thread.title_full: Great weekend - Review of Excelsior Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: julie m
title: Great weekend
text: My husband and I stayed at the Excelsior for a long weekend. The hotel staff was accommodating, super friendly and really enjoyed caring for their guest. The young man who checked us in was terrific helping us with a small problem and the door man found us parking right out front. Our room was clean and well stocked with everything you need. As we stay in the city quite a bit, we notice how quiet it was in this hotel. That's a plus in NYC. We eat at the restaurant and had a fabulous Cuban meal that was reasonably priced and the bar was so much fun!!! The hotel is in a great location as well. Overall I have to rate our weekend and this hotel A+.
